programme.title: The Homecoming - EP 1
programme.desc: Dong Weihong returns to Singapore from the United States with his 9-year-old son after many years. He catches up with his old-time buddies, Chen Hanyuan, Lai Guoqiang and Huang Zhenfa to reminisce the past. Although they shared a secret past, they have now taken different paths in their life. Weihong helps in Zhenfa's car dealing business, while Hanyuan is a successful lawyer. Guoqiang earns his livelihood as a hired "scapegoat" for criminals.

programme.title: Dangdut Kelaz Aku Kamu Paling Pas
programme.desc: Topan (Indra Brotolaras) goes to the village to look for his biological mother with a photo provided by his father. Topan then searches for a dangdut studio, which turns out to have a vocalist named Novia (Nabila Zavira). Novia initially rejects Topan's presence, thinking that city boys don't like dangdut music. But all of that was disproved by Topan's earnestness when learning dangdut music.

programme.title: ANAK BAND - EP 17
programme.desc: Cahaya, who was trading with his vegetable cart, felt like he got a durian collapse when suddenly Gilang, the vocalist of The Junas, Cahaya's favorite band, ran up to Cahaya asking for help so that Cahaya helped him avoid the pursuit of his fans. Light, who was kind and always optimistic, happily helped Gilang hide. Once safe, Gilang came out of hiding and thanked Light. Light was very happy because it turned out that Gilang was very friendly.

programme.title: Merdunya My Baby VS My Bebek
programme.desc: Once there was a conflict, when Ringgo (Kevin Hillers) was herding his ducks, suddenly a duck climbed onto the stage, where there was Elma (Andi Annisa) who was singing and all the audience dispersed.

programme.title: Samudra Cinta - EP 355
programme.desc: The love story between Ocean and Cinta, which had always quarreled before. Gradually, they became friends and slowly grew in love between them. But a secret between the Cinta family and the Samudra family makes their relationship complicated because there is a big secret about Cinta that can ruin their relationship.

programme.title: CINTA AMARA - EP 29
programme.desc: An engineered tragedy left 6-month-old Aziza separated from her mother. However, the baby was rescued by her grandfather and taken as far away as possible, so that her granddaughter would have no further contact with the Nirwan family, the kayakers who own a famous bakery company. Burhan, the baby's grandfather entrusted his granddaughter to his confidant, whose wife was pregnant.

programme.desc: Karin is a 30-year-old girl who has to accept her fate because marriage is mandatory at her age.

programme.title: CINTA AMARA - EP 30
programme.desc: An engineered tragedy left 6-month-old Aziza separated from her mother. However, the baby was rescued by her grandfather and taken as far away as possible, so that her granddaughter would have no further contact with the Nirwan family, the kayakers who own a famous bakery company. Burhan, the baby's grandfather entrusted his granddaughter to his confidant, whose wife was pregnant.

programme.title: LAYANGAN PUTUS CINTA NYAMBUNG TERUS
programme.desc: Chika is a kite seller who dropped out of college due to financial constraints. One day Chika meets a man named Roger who unprovoked scolds Chika and sues Chika for causing his son to fall because he chased Chika to buy a kite.

programme.title: ANAK BAND - EP 18
programme.desc: Cahaya, who was trading with his vegetable cart, felt like he got a durian collapse when suddenly Gilang, the vocalist of The Junas, Cahaya's favorite band, ran up to Cahaya asking for help so that Cahaya helped him avoid the pursuit of his fans. Light, who was kind and always optimistic, happily helped Gilang hide. Once safe, Gilang came out of hiding and thanked Light. Light was very happy because it turned out that Gilang was very friendly.

programme.title: Arjuna Sedang Galau Soalnya Lagi Trend
programme.desc: Sri (Nabila Zavira) has a boyfriend named Bobby (Joshua Otay) who is handsome and the son of a rich man. Sri was surprised to find Bobby with Sri's best friend. They are so intimate. Meanwhile, Bobby is playing victim.

programme.title: Berita Hangit - EP 12
programme.desc: Sebuah program menarik untuk tontonan semua.

programme.title: Bujang 40 - EP 11
programme.desc: Sepanjang hidupnya sudah beberapa kali dia gagal bercinta. Kegagalan ini antara lain disebabkan sikap ibunya yang terlalu mengongkong hidupnya. Ini membuatkan Bujang mengambil keputusan untuk terus membujang.

programme.title: Warung Sepahtu - EP 4
programme.desc: Jom lepak santai sambil sembang dan bergelak tawa bersama Jep, Shuib, Rahim & Pak Ya dalam sebuah program terbaru, Warung Sepahtu selain turut menampilkan tetamu undangan yang pasti menghiburkan.

programme.title: Ta Vie Sans Ca - EP 54

programme.title: Movie - Maaveeran
programme.desc: Harsha is falsely implicated for killing Indu's father and she too is kidnapped. But Harsha and Indu share a bond from a previous life, and when he realises this, he sets out to set things straight.

programme.title: Movie - Rameswaram
programme.desc: Vasanthi, who belongs to a well-off family, meets Jeevan, a Sri Lankan refugee yearning to return home. Their bond of friendship soon takes the form of love.

programme.title: Movie - Chinna Paravaikale
programme.desc: Asha, during her forest expedition, gets trapped in quicksand and is saved by the locals. Sriram, a forest officer, makes a false promise to marry Asha, and she falls into his trap.

programme.title: Movie - Dhairiyam
programme.desc: Kumaran saves Jenny from the perpetrator Pawan. Following a duel, Pawan slips into a coma while his friends are found dead. The mystery behind the murders unravels in a story of twists and turns.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.title: Movie - Santhosam
programme.desc: Annu falls in love with Pratik, her sister's husband. Later, Pratik, as a widower, seeks Annu's hand in marriage. However, her family arranges her marriage with a childhood friend.

programme.title: Movie - Manam Virumbudhe Unnai
programme.desc: When Shanmugam's kids insist on a picture of their mother, he shows them a random picture of a girl. Things take an amusing turn when the kids bump into Priya, who looks just like the girl from the picture.

programme.title: Movie - Uyarntha Ullam
programme.desc: Anand, a wealthy man, spends his time drinking, gambling and entertaining his friends. When he meets Geetha, a young woman, he is smitten by her and decides to mend his ways.

programme.title: Movie - Jeeva
programme.desc: Jeeva, an unemployed youth, lives an ordinary life with his widowed mother and younger sister. His life turns upside down when his family gets murdered.

programme.title: Movie - Padikathavan (New)
programme.desc: Rocky, a school dropout, is constantly looked down upon by his father. He spends all his time in a mechanic shop. Problems arise in his life after he falls in love with Gayathri.

programme.title: Movie - Kutra Pirivu
programme.desc: When Inspector Ranadheer learns about the corrupt ways of Ravikanth, he sets out to expose him. In the process, he loses his wife.

programme.title: Movie - Echil Iravugal
programme.desc: Echchil Iravugal is a 1982 Indian Tamil-language film directed by Prof. A. S. Pragasam, starring Roopa, Prathap Pothan, Raveendran and Vanitha.

programme.title: Movie - En Sahiye
programme.desc: En Sakhiye is a 2000 Tamil-language romantic thriller film directed by the duo Ravi-Raja. The film stars newcomers Devaraj, Divya and Prabhu Sekhar, with K. Rajan.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.title: Movie - Mannin Mainden
programme.desc: Rivalry between two gangsters is at its peak when the henchman of one of them falls for the daughter of the other. It remains to be seen as to who wins the battle between love and hatred.

programme.title: Movie - Kalakalappu (Old)
programme.desc: Divya falls in love with Karna, who works as a servant at her sister's house. However, complications arise when Divya's dying sister asks her to marry her brother-in-law.

programme.title: Movie - Thaai Veedu
programme.desc: A rich man owns an antique sword which is the family's heirloom; another man makes several unsuccessful attempts to steal it. He then employs the rich man's long-lost son to steal it, but the truth is revealed in time.

programme.title: Movie - Vande Madharam
programme.desc: Two tough police officers are dedicated towards the eradication of terrorism. They also work towards the cause of farmer's welfare and are disturbed by the infiltration of terrorists in this arena.

programme.title: Movie - Aai
programme.desc: A military officer cripples his arch-enemy for killing his friend and escapes with his sister. He sets out to fight against this gangster when he comes to kill his sister and ladylove.

programme.title: Hologic WTA Tour 2025
programme.desc: The German Open is a professional tennis tournament played on outdoor grass courts at the Rot-Weiss Tennis Club in Berlin, Germany. 2025 will be the 98th edition. It is one of the oldest tournaments for women. With the venue’s centre court hosting up to 4,500 fans, this tournament acts as a preview for Wimbledon in both play and atmosphere.

programme.title: World Matchplay Darts 2025 Final
programme.desc: The 2025 Betfred World Matchplay will take place at the Winter Gardens, Blackpool. The iconic summer tournament will see 32 of the world's top stars battling it out across 9 days for the Phil Taylor Trophy and £800,000 in prize money.

programme.title: Hologic WTA Tour 2025
programme.desc: The Bad Homburg Open is a women's professional tennis tournament held on outdoor grass courts at the Bad Homburg Tennis Club in Bad Homburg, Germany. The town is known for champaign air. 32 singles players will battle it out for the prize purse of $1,064,510. The Bad Homburg Open powered by Solarwatt is the last 500-tier event before Wimbledon.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 42
programme.desc: In this PL Stories show, Tim Howard, who has neurodiverse conditions, leads a conversation with past and present players, exploring the challenges and strengths of living with neurodiversity. Through personal stories, including those of Joao Gomes (stutter), Steven Naismith (dyslexia), Greg Halford (autism), and Charlie Austin (ADHD), the show celebrates resilience and the positive impact neurodiverse traits bring to the football world.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 51
programme.desc: As the curtain comes down on Everton's time at Goodison Park, PL Stories takes a poignant look back at one of English football's most iconic grounds. For over 130 years, Goodison has been more than just a stadium; it's been a home, a fortress, and the stage for countless moments of triumph, heartbreak, and unforgettable drama.

programme.desc: Highlight match action from the Premier League's USA Summer Series.

programme.desc: Highlight match action from the Premier League's USA Summer Series.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 7
programme.desc: Arguably the greatest American goalkeeper of all time, Brad Friedel made an incredible 450 appearances in the Premier League playing for Tottenham, Aston Villa, Blackburn and Liverpool. We sit down with the 52-year-old to recount his incredible journey to the top of English football.

programme.title: PL 100: ROBIN VAN PERSIE
programme.desc: Premier League 100, celebrates some of the leading names to have achieved iconic milestones within England's top flight. From scoring over 100 goals, to making over 100 clean sheets, we speak to the legends that left their mark and reflect on the goals and saves that set them apart from their rivals

programme.title: PL BEST OF... PREMIER LEAGUE DUTCH MASTERS
programme.desc: A high-energy hour showcasing legendary Dutch footballers, including Ruud Gullit, Edwin van der Sar, George Boateng, Mario Melchiot, Jaap Stam and more.

programme.title: REVIEW OF THE SEASON - 2024/2025 (LIV)
programme.desc: Relive another extraordinary Premier League campaign as Liverpool soared to an historic 20th league title, Nottingham Forest defied expectations and the promoted sides were strenuously challenged. There were also tactical transformations, shifts in narrative trends, and a more open field than ever before. Review of the Season documents all of the thrilling stories to emerge across the 380 matches.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 1
programme.desc: We catch up with Juan Mata in Australia, where the former Premier League star is now playing with Western Sydney Wanderers. The Spaniard reflects on his memorable years in England with Chelsea and Manchester United, sharing insights into his greatest moments, personal growth, and connection with fans. As he begins a new chapter down under, he also opens up about life after the Premier League and what lies ahead both on and off the pitch.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 8
programme.desc: We celebrate the unique legacy of footballing dynasties in the Premier League; where talent, passion, and pride are passed from one generation to the next. From the iconic saves of Peter Schmeichel to the rise of his son Kasper, the goal-scoring legacy of Ian Wright carried on by son's Shaun and Bradley, and the Lampards' deep-rooted Chelsea connection, this episode explores the bonds that tie football families together.

programme.title: MATCH HIGHLIGHTS 24/25 MW33 Aston Villa v Newcastle United
programme.desc: Each Premier League game from the 2024/25 season condensed into an individual 26-minute highlights show.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 52
programme.desc: We dive into the fiercest rivalry in English football-Manchester United and Liverpool. As Liverpool draw level with United's record haul of top-flight titles, this is a story of history, pride, and the relentless pursuit of greatness. With insight from icons on both sides-Ian Rush, Lou Macari, Brian Kidd, Michael Owen, Phil Thompson, and new Liverpool boss Arne Slot, we unpack the moments that have defined generations, split families, and lit up the Premier League.

programme.title: MATCH HIGHLIGHTS 24/25 MW34 Liverpool v Tottenham Hotspur
programme.desc: Each Premier League game from the 2024/25 season condensed into an individual 26-minute highlights show.

programme.title: PL MOMENTS - EP 15
programme.desc: Steve McManaman revisits ten standout moments from his Premier League career, from his breakthrough at Anfield to unforgettable solo goals and Merseyside derby magic. With flair, humour and personal insight, PL Moments takes you inside the story of one of the Premier League's most creative and entertaining players.

programme.title: REVIEW - SUN 27 APR
programme.desc: Highlights of every Matchweek 34 fixture, including the big one at Anfield where Liverpool look to seal the title, Chelsea against Everton, and Manchester United's visit to the Vitality Stadium, as they face Bournemouth.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 16
programme.desc: Kaoru Mitoma's football talent was evident from a young age in Japan, but when a professional opportunity came, he made the unexpected choice that left many surprised. This episode unravels the unique path that took Mitoma from university to the Premier League, where he's now making his mark on the world's toughest football stage.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW - EP 42
programme.desc: With the remnants of the celebratory confetti barely gone from the Anfield pitch, Curtis Jones joins the Big Interview to reflect on an historic title-winning season. Having signed for his beloved team at just 9 years of age, the Liverpool born and bred midfielder explains just how much the title triumph means to him and sheds light on the impact of Arne Slot and the differences in approach of his new manager compared to Jurgen Klopp.

programme.desc: In this episode Themba 'The Answer' Gorimbo meets Lyle 'Krusher' Karam for the World Welterweight Championship.

programme.title: MEGA Fights Joe Calzaghe vs Roy Jones Jr.
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features a light heavyweight championship match between Joe Calzaghe (45-0, 32 KOs) and Roy Jones Jr. (52-4, 38 KOs) from Madison Square Garden in New York City, New York, USA, on November 8, 2008.

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode we see the best of the first ever Judo Grand Prix from Cancun, stop to get to know number 2 ranked fighter in the world Tal Flicker, and show a demonstration on how to execute one of Flicker's favorite submissions.

programme.title: XMA
programme.desc: In this episode we focus on the martial art of breaking and how the techniques are fine-tuned with technology.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Floyd Mayweather, Jr. vs. Oscar De La Hoya
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a heavily-anticipated contest featuring two of boxing's greats - Floyd Mayweather, Jr. and Oscar De La Hoya. This fight set the record for most pay-per-view buys, as 2.4 million purchases led to over $135 million in revenue. The winner of this closely-contested bout would be WBC light middleweight champion.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Episode 2, from Ryogoku Kokugikan in Tokyo, Japan features Kiribayama, Terunofuji, Wakatakakage and Hoshoryu.

programme.desc: Dozens of contestants converge on the banks of Biscayne Bay to compete on a redesigned course, featuring new obstacles: the Downhill Pipe Drop and Dancing Stones!

programme.desc: From the T-Mobile Arena in Las Vegas, undefeated Super Welterweight World Champion Tim Tszyu travels from Australia to defend his title against former World Champion Sebastian Fundora. programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 7
programme.desc: Roly reveals he's expecting a new baby brother or sister, and the Squirrels have questions.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 8
programme.desc: The Squirrels want to help Plinky find her scary side. Fortunately, Duggee has his monster badge.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 9
programme.desc: The Squirrels find a dusty, old book behind a cupboard... it's Duggee's diary from when he was a teenager! The Squirrels are keen to write diaries of their own.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) - EP 17
programme.desc: Ubercorn and Glitch head to the Svalbard Global Seed Vault. But, just like when they were cadets together, the two of them get into trouble.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) - EP 18
programme.desc: Glitch's wishes cause underground trouble in Istanbul - an ancient ceiling may collapse!

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 1
programme.desc: Chilli and Bandit transform the old nursery into a new bedroom for Bluey. In the process, Bluey and Bingo amicably divide their belongings, but get absorbed by trading items and swapping notes at bedtime. Ultimately, when Bluey misses her sister, she asks to return to her old room.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 2
programme.desc: Chilli sets up an obstacle course in the backyard, but Bluey is disheartened when Bandit turns it into a race and beats her. After cheating in a rematch, Bluey discovers the importance of training in order to improve her skills.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 3
programme.desc: Bluey keeps breaking her promises! But after seeing how much Bingo trusts Mum's word, Bluey learns the power of promises and why it's important not to break them.

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) - EP 75
programme.desc: Tinky Winky, Laa-Laa and Po pick delicious green beans. The Noo-­‐noo puts the beans into the Tubby Custard Machine and out comes tasty, green Tubby Custard!

programme.title: Teletubbies Ready Steady Go! (S1) - EP 8
programme.desc: Join the dance party with the Teletubbies! Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po dance and sing about silly things that make them smile.

programme.title: Pop Paper City (S1) - EP 12
programme.desc: Helping Hand has organised a pirate treasure hunt.

programme.title: Dog Loves Books (S1) - EP 52
programme.desc: Pug makes a kite but he doesn't know how to fly it.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO (S1) - EP 23
programme.desc: Messy has to save OKIDO from a falling comet before his bedtime! He sees that Mayor Oki still has his bath!

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO (S1) - EP 24
programme.desc: There's some funny 'buzzy-ness' going on in OKIDO. Where are all the bees? Messy and friends meet bee royalty and save the day!

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) - EP 14
programme.desc: When Monty gets a new bike, he must say goodbye to his old one. He wonders why you have to let go of things when you outgrow them.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S2) - EP 23

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S2) - EP 22
programme.desc: When JoJo and Gran Gran visit the aquarium, JoJo is amazed by the sea creatures and meets a special friend of Gran Gran's.

programme.desc: When Umbrella gets left on the bus, Sarah and Duck head to the bus depot in search of their friend.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) - EP 35
programme.desc: Sarah is fascinated by some mysterious music coming from the hedge.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 37
programme.desc: Princesses, horses and magic wands. Bluey and Chloe can play any role they want, when they embark on an adventure to save their playground kingdom from the Greedy Queen.

programme.desc: Xuli and Foz help NASA after a close encounter with a UFO makes them lose the Mars Rover.

programme.desc: He-He and Krash are preparing a special tea party for Lily.

programme.desc: Bluey and Bingo are playing The Quiet Game and won't use words to tell Dad which toy to buy for Muffin. At his wit's end, Dad recruits new store clerk Alfie to help interpret the girls' miming.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 37

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 - EP 8
programme.desc: Tom has to keep his mom, Olivia, distracted while Jun, Alex, and D’Angelo use a new dragon to close off a cave leading to the Crystal Realm, and prevent her from discovering the dragons.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 - EP 21
programme.desc: After helping George and Harold make a comic featuring the heroine Plungerina, Erica asserts that Plungerina could be better that Captain Underpants. To prove her wrong, the boys decide to actually create the villain in the comic and then have Captain Underpants save the day. Unfortunately, Krupp - and therefore Captain Underpants - is away at a principals' convention.There's no one to save them...until a real life Plungerina saves tthe day! But who is really Plungerina?

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight S1 - EP 20
programme.desc: The Mad Scientist turns out to be an ally called Akna, who has a history with Blade's brother Alfie. And Blade learns another truth about her brother and his mission. And in the course of a skirmish with Klaus and Veruca, the weapons change hands again.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight S1 - EP 21
programme.desc: As the Dragon Knights prepare to battle for the weapons and control of Tikal, Mastodon attempts to teach Po how to access storm powers to use in the fight. Blade comes face to face with Klaus and Veruca.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight S1 - EP 22
programme.desc: The team heads into a final confrontation for the weapons that not only threatens Tikal, but their lives. And Po must share hero duties with Mastodon.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! S2 - EP 41
programme.desc: Tip starts dating Stick, but ruins the relationship when she tries to change him/Tip tries to impress the older kids at her first ninth grade party but, Oh's Boovy behavior embarrasses her

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! S2 - EP 42
programme.desc: When Tip wants her nose pierced, Oh and the Boov become obsessed with modifying their bodies/Tip doesn't want to go to school anymore and discovers a shortcut to infinite knowledge

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. S2 - EP 41
programme.desc: Turbo takes Beakless under his wing during a battle of snails vs. birds; Chet is Sheriff of a western Turbotown and fights a gang of outlaw crickets.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. S2 - EP 42
programme.desc: Skidmark competes with rich snail Shellsworth to build a railroad; Turbo and Chet roadtrip with their trucker dad and protect their cargo from bandits.

programme.title: Dinotrux S1 - EP 21
programme.desc: The Dinotrux crew builds an aqueduct to bring water back to the Flatirons during a drought, but D-Structs tries to sabotage their plan.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show S1 - EP 22
programme.desc: When a special guest is revealed as the villainous Goldentoe and hijacks the show, Peabody and Sherman must find a way to escape and regain control

programme.title: Casper's Scare School S1 - EP 21
programme.desc: Power Outage - Part 3: Escape from Scare School Things worsen when a leprechaun, Razznik, steals the magical cleptor that now holds all of Scare School's powers. Power Outage - Part 4: The Final Battle On a hunt for ghostly powers, the evil leprechaun orders Deedstown to hand over Casper's uncles, OR ELSE.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S1 - EP 21
programme.desc: It's Christmas Day and Noddy's got a new snowglobe. He wishes it would snow outside but Big Ears tells him that it has never snowed in Toyland. Noddy uses all his investigating skills to works out that by combining Smartysaurus glitter experiment with Deltoid's soccer ball and using Revs' lights, he can light up the DareDale caves with beautiful snowflake images just like the inside of his snowglove. If anyone can make it snow in Toyland, Noddy can! Hurrah!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service S3 - EP 21
programme.desc: It's a snowy day in Greendale, and Ted Glen has invited the kids to his workshop to meet his friend, space expert Professor Farrow. Julian's excited but so is Pat, who has always yearned to be an astronaut. He's even more thrilled when he finds that his special delivery is a space suit - an extra surprise for the kids. When his van breaks down in a snowy lane, he finds an ingenious solution - only to suffer a puncture - and Ted is unable to help...

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots S2 - EP 73
programme.desc: Violet is organising a flower festival. She is so busy helping the other tots with their blooms she has neglected hers. Will her flower open in time for the big day?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S1 - EP 21
programme.desc: Raa Raa wants a partner to dance a noisy stompy dance with. All the animals have their own way of dancing, apart from Zebby who says she is too shy to dance… or is she?

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! S1 - EP 22
programme.desc: When Tag is frustrated living in a crowded house, and Scooch is bored in a quiet house, the two friends switch houses for the day. At first they both love their new lives. But as Scooch gets overwhelmed by all the activity at The Barker house, and Tag gets bored by the quiet life at the Pooch’s, they eagerly switch back before the day is done. \ When the Pawston Get Sox go on a losing streak, Tag and Scooch come up with the idea to have a team mascot.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal S1 - EP 22
programme.desc: Leroy must learn to let go when his caterpillar friend turns into a butterfly. / When Pixie loses her spark, Kelp and Juniper look for the plant they think will cure her. Meanwhile Pixie wonders whether she can be cured at all!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 - EP 16
programme.desc: After injecting all the teachers with bee DNA, the Melvins run the new "hivemind" of the school. But Ms. Ribble is accidently injected with too much "Bee- NA" and becomes the queen bee, overpowering the Melvins' control. George, Harold and the recently re-hired Vice Principal Krupp must work with the Melvins and stop her from turning everyone into her Zombees.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business S1 - EP 16
programme.desc: Boss Baby must "de-stink" Simmons after a misfire of Stinkless Serum, and Tim & Danny try to upgrade their small- scale taxi business

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 - EP 3
programme.desc: When the Bettermans invite the Croods to join their family game night, two things become clear: Phil needs to win and Grug hates to lose.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City S1 - EP 6
programme.desc: Already stretched thin between responsibilities, Yi discovers one of Morty’s babies still in her building. She attempts to juggle her various responsibilities dumpling shop work, violin, magical creature childcare!), but it’s too much and she accidentally "loses" Mini-Morty. She’s going to need help from Jin and Peng to find Mini-Morty and return the baby creature to her mother.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 - EP 3
programme.desc: Tom and Jun encounter unexpected dangers and are separated while exploring the Hidden Realm of dragons. Tom introduces Jun to the dragon world, and Jun bonds with a dragon of her own - Wu and Wei.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! S1 - EP 16
programme.desc: When Peppy invites Branch to go on a Swag Stag hunt, Branch is nervous and invents a tall tale that he must keep up with/DJ Suki confesses that she's nervous to throw a party so Poppy suggests she join the Party Crash Course

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries S1 - EP 5
programme.desc: When Marcus brings home the class tree sapling for the weekend, the Dew Drops see it starting to wilt and must cheer the sapling up, so Marcus can make sure to plant it for his class. / When Athena accidentally breaks Lola's nature sculpture, the Dew Drops must go on a scavenger hunt to replace the missing pieces.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries S1 - EP 6
programme.desc: Lola, Dylan and Cassie have tickets to the carnival, but when Dylan loses his ticket, the Dew Drops set out to find it. / When Phoebe accidentally gets tossed into Nicholas' diaper bag before a trip to the park, Phoebe has to help a baby bird, while Eden and Athena must help Marcus rehearse for his big concert.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go S1 - EP 9
programme.desc: The Community Center's Lost and Found is full and it's up to the gang to use their detective skills and return the lost items to their original owners. / Rodney only needs one more bird on his birdwatching list, but the only problem is that it only comes out at night! Team Zenko must help Rodney face his fear of the dark so he can get the last picture for his collection.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go S1 - EP 10
programme.desc: Donna plans a garden party for Rona, but the only problem is that her garden is overgrown and neglected. The team try to transform this jungle into a backyard just in time for the party. / Lula finds an angry goose on the loose, and Team Zenko need to get it out of the park before soccer camp starts.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders S1 - EP 5
programme.desc: The Rescue Riders get stuck in a cave with their rival, Magnus, during a race to find a new source of an important mineral.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders S1 - EP 6
programme.desc: Frustrated that she's not fitting in with the team, Aggro goes off on her own with Elbone on a mission to save a dragon egg trapped in ice.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal S1 - EP 5
programme.desc: Kelp and his underwater friends race around an obstacle course, but Cruz gets sucked into a whirlpool. As each of them try to rescue him, they are sucked in! Kelp saves them all using his unicorn spark to create bubbles he attaches to seaweed. / Kelp helps his unicorn friends create music with their horns and pieces of nature. Ollie is embarrassed by the sound of his horn.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal S1 - EP 6
programme.desc: Cruz decides to turn the sunken ship into a park. But all his and Kelp’s "fun-crastinating" puts the project in jeopardy. / Kelp accidentally knocks a boulder into the stream, blocking the flow while trying his unicorn spark. Frustrated by magic, Kelp uses the narwhal way.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S2 - EP 31
programme.desc: The PALs join AI and Javier on a mustang drive, but when Javier gets injured, it’s up to Lucky and Spirit to get him to safety

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S2 - EP 32
programme.desc: When Snips claims not to be afraid of ghosts, the PALs decide to give him a fun Halloween scare he’ll never forget!

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S2 - EP 31
programme.desc: Jealousy overtakes Puss when he suddenly feels like the third wheel after the Goodsword has an instant connection to El Guante Blanco.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S2 - EP 32
programme.desc: Dulcinea and the entire town must save the day after Puss attempts to rescue Uli with the help of El Guante Blanco, Golem, Goodsword and the Dutchess.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S2 - EP 31
programme.desc: A run-of-the-mill arts and crafts session turns into an interdimensional adventure from which Harold, George and company may never return.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S2 - EP 32
programme.desc: Krupp's campers take on rich rivals in a hoity-toity boat race that also features a revenge-obsessed giant salamander. Paging Captain Underpants!

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! S1 - EP 16
programme.desc: When Tag is left in charge of the Pawston Pawtomotive for the day, Frank and Beans open up a rival garage and take all the business. But when all the cars around Pawston break down because of Frank's shoddy mechanic work, Tag and Scooch have to go around town to fix all his mistakes. \ Scooch wants to be a Tail-kwondo master like his hero, Master Wag, but he can't break a biscuit with his tail.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal S1 - EP 16
programme.desc: When shark and pilot fish are separated it’s up to Kelp, Scallop, Cruz, and Waverly to help them find each other again. / Scallop’s friend Theo finally comes clean on why he’s always rushing off.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 68
programme.desc: Crispin Biscuits frames Boss and Tina’s startup company for exploding baby Iggy’s favorite stuffed animal, and Tina is forced to the sidelines to avoid any more bad press. As Crispin expands his plan to burst all the plush toys in the neighborhood, Tina discovers she can stop this by breaking open and rewiring a single toy doll. Unfortunately that doll is Baby Corp’s current head honcho, Pull-String CEO Baby.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 69
programme.desc: On the hottest week of the year and a miserable time for babies, Boss and Tim infiltrates a country club with a very cool splash pad in order to find some way around their strict "no-babies" policy. Meanwhile, Banker Baby Benny visits the startup company to check on his investment. Tina has to cover up how the heat has split her coworkers into lawless factions fighting over a fan and a mist cooler.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 70
programme.desc: An overworked and under loved Precious has to choose between the Templeton Family startup business or Crispin Biscuits’ fun playtime. Meanwhile, the company makes its first purchase: upgraded communicators! R & D Baby Simmons is reluctant to fix the model they have, which picks up signals from her favorite lvorian soap opera, "Bridges Aflame." Over a live broadcast, Simmons must convince the cast to tie up every loose plot thread before she has to lose the signal forever.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 - EP 12
programme.desc: The Crood and Betterman parents have been struggling to get along - they’re so different! The two couple realize they need some time apart and decide to get away from the farm and each other. Too bad both couples choose to take a break on the same, small beach.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 - EP 13
programme.desc: While the parents are away, the kids are in charge of the tree house, but when the punch monkeys invade the house, the kids find themselves out of their element.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Struggling to find their purpose on the Betterman farm, the Croods see an opportunity to prove their worth by harvesting Phil’s perilous (and sticky) bounceberries.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City S1 - EP 2
programme.desc: While Yi and the crew try to pinpoint how Yi’s magic works, they notice that Everest isn’t looking too hot. In fact, he’s too hot. The crew tries everything to cool him down, even begging their old foe, Burnish, for help.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 - EP 9
programme.desc: When Feather is taken by a group of what appear to be zombie dragons, Alex finds her inner hero and rescues her friend.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 - EP 22
programme.desc: When Krupp transfers to another school, George and Harold follow, only to find a bizarro version of Jerome Horwitz Elementary, where the teachers are nice and the kids are well-behaved. But no one's having any fun! George and Harold want to right this wrong with pranks and comics. But Krupp enlists Mr. Neamer (bizarro Meaner), who then super-enlargers his brain and becomes Brainy Blabulous, in order to stop the subversion of authority.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight S2 - EP 25
programme.desc: There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponents-her mom.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight S2 - EP 26

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! S2 - EP 43
programme.desc: Tip tricks Oh into thinking he's invincible to convince him to go on a dangerous adventure/Sharzod takes revenge when she loses her squad to her arch-rival Fance

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! S2 - EP 44
programme.desc: When Tip and Oh bring Fox and Pom Pom together, the baddies get badder/When Oh agrees to be Donny's wingman for a job, Donny introduces him to a shady underworld

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. S2 - EP 43
programme.desc: The crew gets stranded on a candy-filled mystery island; Burn isn't herself after a losing streak so the crew goes to extreme lengths to help her win.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. S2 - EP 44
programme.desc: Turbo tries to juggle two dates at a party without being caught; White Shadow takes Skid's advice on superstitions to keep his winning streak alive.

programme.title: Dinotrux S1 - EP 22
programme.desc: A fierce windstorm traps the gang inside the garage and they have fun together all night, but once the food runs out they team up to find a way out.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show S1 - EP 23
programme.desc: Sherman trades places with a kid Emperor and learns that being king is harder than it seems and Peabody's new co-host is out of control

programme.title: Casper's Scare School S1 - EP 22
programme.desc: Ghost in the Gallery After hearing reports of a ghost stealing artwork from the Deedstown Museum, Casper becomes convinced that his uncles are involved. Wart on the Nose When Professor Thurdigree Burns comes down with dragon flu, Casper, Mantha and Ra are tasked with finding a cure.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S1 - EP 22
programme.desc: All the toys in Toyland are visiting Fuse's workshop for a toy check but something is wrong! Toys are fine before the check and wonky after! Noddy investigates why toys are going wonky so that he can help them return to normal quickly. With the help of his wwwbook and following all the clues Noddy works out that Fuse has given himself a robot upgrade to help him do the toy checks quickly but he installed it incorrectly.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service S3 - EP 22
programme.desc: It's Chris Beacon's birthday and he's looking forward to spending the day onshore and having a party at the village hall. Pat's SDS mission is to pick up all the presents from everyone who won't be able to be at the party later.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots S2 - EP 74
programme.desc: Diggly is bored of the same old scraps every day. Fifi and Bumble decide to make him a pumpkin pie as a surprise. But there's no flour left to make the pastry, what will they use instead?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S1 - EP 22
programme.desc: Raa Raa has decided that the jingly jangly jungle is not jingly or jangly enough. He and his friends make lots of noise, but soon learn that they need to work together to make a wonderful jingly jangly jungle noise.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! S1 - EP 23
programme.desc: When Tag worries that she's no longer a "Go" dog, Lady Lydia helps her find a new persona by helping Tag try on a bunch of different hats. Luckily, when a runaway puppy needs to be wrangled, and only the speedy Tag can catch him, Tag realizes she was a Go dog all along. \ Sergeant Pooch reads Scooch, Tag and Kit a story book during their sleepover. But when the last pages are missing, the three kids work together to make up their own ending to the story.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal S1 - EP 23
programme.desc: The kids scare away a swarm of bees. But when they realize bees make the flowers happy, they hatch a plan to get them back! / When Scallop makes a bad choice, Kelp helps her learn from her mistakes.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 - EP 17
programme.desc: In hopes of raising their grades so they can go to Lake Summer Camp, George and Harold must teach Ratrick, their assigned rat, a simple task. But Ratrick runs away into the sewers where he is doused with toxic waste and transformed into Poopacabra! It's now up to the boys and Captain Underpants to stop the beast before it takes over Piqua with its stench, and more importantly, ruins the boys' chances to go to Lake Summer Camp.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business S1 - EP 17
programme.desc: When Frederic Estes tries to get babies banned from the local library, the babies fight back in a war for story time

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 - EP 4
programme.desc: After a crowverine gliding mishap, Dawn loses her confidence and tells Eep she's taking a break from adventures. Eep convinces Dawn to join her on one last adventure - climbing Grrr Mountain.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City S1 - EP 7
programme.desc: Right before basketball tryouts, Peng learns from NaiNai that it is his "big bad" year on the zodiac calendar - which means bad luck. Peng is skeptical at first, but after seeing the positive effects of adhering to NaiNai’s superstitions, he dives headfirst into learning all he can to secure his spot on the team. Eventually, he becomes so consumed that he "breaks up" with Yi and Jin because of their zodiac incompatibility.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 - EP 4
programme.desc: Tom and Jun take a risk in revealing the secret of the Hidden Realm to D’Angelo to aid an injured dragon, and D’Angelo bonds with Plowhorn.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! S1 - EP 17
programme.desc: The Trolls try to entertain and win over Archer Pastry with a series of Troll stories/When a rainbow over Troll Village begins to experience a catastrophic breakdown, Cloud Guy arrives in the village to offer his assistance

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries S1 - EP 7
programme.desc: When Harper unknowingly drops her cooking camp application on the way to post office, it’s up to the Dew Drops to get it into that big blue mailbox. / When Cassie accidentally places Lola's beloved, old toy wand in a box marked for a giveaway drive in the park, the Dew Drops must find a way to retrieve the wand before it ends up in the hands of an entirely new family.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries S1 - EP 8
programme.desc: Marcus has a piano recital and unknowingly forgets his lucky penny at home. Now it’s up to the Dew Drops to get the penny across town and back into Marcus’ pocket before showtime. / When Nicholas rolls the hamster ball (with Hammy inside) out into the streets, the Dew Drops must get Hammy back home safely.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go S1 - EP 11
programme.desc: Mr. Tanaka is moving places all by himself, so Team Zenko step in to assist, and learn the importance of asking people for help. / When Sam's skateboard competition falls on the same day as her favourite creator Ken KaBlam's comic book signing, TZG secretly prevents him leaving town before she gets the chance to meet him.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go S1 - EP 12
programme.desc: When easily-distracted Luis is tasked with getting flowers for his grandmother's birthday party, TZG secretly keeps him on track. / When Rodney's honey bees escape from their apiary (artificial beehive), TZG secretly brings them back.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders S1 - EP 7
programme.desc: When the other dragons come down with the flu, Summer must overcome her fear of eels to retrieve the cure and get her friends back in the air.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders S1 - EP 8
programme.desc: Magnus hatches a plan to hide in an egg to spy on the Rescue Riders. But things get all scrambled when a mama dragon takes him to her nest.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal S1 - EP 7
programme.desc: Kelp and Scallop enlist Cruz’s help to perform a dance for Mom’s birthday. Though it’s hard at first, they learn to put their dolphin, unicorn, and narwhal powers together to create something special. / Kelp, Pixie, Ollie, and their friend Leroy try to help Juniper understand her angry feelings.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal S1 - EP 8
programme.desc: Scallop is afraid of her first "tuskist" appointment. Kelp helps her get through it with a song. / Fog rolls in, threatening Kelp’s first Three Moon Festival in Unicorn Land. Kelp and his friends use a combination of unicorn spark and the Kelp Way to create a new festival.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S2 - EP 33
programme.desc: Lucky, Spirit and the PALs journey to deliver a very special wedding invitation, but they have a surprise waiting when they arrive

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S2 - EP 34
programme.desc: When Grayson has the only working well during an unexpected heat wave, Lucky has to find an alternate source of water

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S2 - EP 33
programme.desc: When Puss accidentally agrees to ride for both Artephius and the orphans in the annual San Lorenzo horse race, his twin Puss Dos enters the race.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S2 - EP 34
programme.desc: Dulcinea must save the town from thieves when Puss and the townspeople become obsessed with a gambling game and forget to protect San Lorenzo.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S2 - EP 33
programme.desc: The campers' splat-tastic game of paintball is rather rudely interrupted by a foul and formidable fiend known only as Camoflush.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S2 - EP 34
programme.desc: With fun in short supply, Harold and George persuade Krupp to dump the campers in the middle of the forest so they can learn to rough it.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! S1 - EP 17
programme.desc: Tag and Scooch embark on a road trip to Chew York City to track down Kelly Korgi to ask her to perform at Pawston’s 100th birthday party.\ When Kelly Korgi tells Tag she can’t perform at Pawston’s 100th birthday party, she and Scooch decide to create a Kelly Korgi replacement so that she doesn’t break her promise to the town.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal S1 - EP 17
programme.desc: The kids have a race to decide who gets to try some extremely rare berries. / When Scallop finds a beautiful and mysterious sea sculpture, she enlists the help of her friends to search the sea for the artist behind the masterpiece.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 71
programme.desc: Uncle Benji makes a surprise visit to the Templeton Family with a cute baby of his own: Lil Bit Guerrero! Tina gets jealous of Carol doting on Lil Bit, while Benji reveals that in order to make his daughter proud of him, he’s applied to become a Federal Agent. With Boss Baby’s cover at stake, it’s up to the Templeton Family to get Benji out of their hair as he sniffs around for a case that could garner the attention from federal law enforcement.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 72
programme.desc: A bummed out Tina takes a vacation to the baby resort, Floaties! However, her mind is still back at work, and struggled to actually enjoy her vacation. And it gets worse when Crispin Biscuits switches electronic ID tags with her, causing everyone to assume Tina actually is Crispin Biscuits. With Crispin having booked her for a seemingly endless stay, Tina is trapped in a paradise nightmare, and in a tunnel of madness starts to think that she may even be Crispin.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 73
programme.desc: Crispin Biscuits heists the underwater Baby Bank in an attempt to steal all the funds from Boss and Tina’s new company. Boss, Tina and Banker Baby Benny must infiltrate the bank via submarine to stop this high-stakes aquatic robbery. But Boss and Tina struggle to stay on the same page after Tina admits that she might, kinda, sorta be thinking about retiring as a regular baby.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 - EP 2
programme.desc: When Eep wants alone time with her new friend Dawn, Guy seeks a new friend of his own and finds an unlikely companion in Thunk.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 - EP 3
programme.desc: When the Bettermans invite the Croods to join their family game night, two things become clear: Phil needs to win and Grug hates to lose.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 - EP 4
programme.desc: After a crowverine gliding mishap, Dawn loses her confidence and tells Eep she's taking a break from adventures. Eep convinces Dawn to join her on one last adventure - climbing Grrr Mountain.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City S1 - EP 3
programme.desc: An earth-shaking rumble signals the arrival of a new creature, but Yi and Jin butt heads, each convinced they’re the better team leader. The crew eventually discovers that the massive Sewer Koi is behind the earthquakes, but he’s missing his precious pearl, the key to a magical underground dam. Without it, the sewer’s water levels will rise, threatening to overflow and flood the whole city! It’s going to take a heist to extract the pearl from its display at a local museum, before it’s too late.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 - EP 10
programme.desc: Tom and Thunder train a new species of aggressive tidal dragons to help the other riders put out a forest fire threatening ICARIS.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 - EP 23
programme.desc: In order to spice up their field trip to Romeinday (an ancient Rome reenactment park), George and Harold trick Melvin into turning the bus into a time machine so they can travel to actual ancient Rome and be gladiators. After offending Caesar with their comic, the emperor is accidentally turned into Cruelius Sneezer and pursues the school group with all his might.

programme.desc: Rick aims to negotiate a football helmet signed by 28 Heisman winners. Chum travels to LA to iron out a deal for vintage garb. Will he be able to thread the needle, or will his trip be oh sew pointless?

programme.title: Storage Wars (S14) - EP 311
programme.desc: Ivy is on the warpath in Lancaster, doing his best to intimidate the other buyers, and he won't be losing any sleep over it. Brandi begrudgingly lets Bozek decide which locker they buy.

programme.title: Storage Wars (S14) - EP 312
programme.desc: Barry utilises a tactic to snatch up a locker... and it ties him up in knots. Brandi shops in the bargain basement but puts on a show in the process. Ivy lands a large unit and the tools stack right up.

programme.title: Mysteries Unearthed With Danny Trejo (S1) - EP 2
programme.desc: From ancient religious texts buried in Egypt to cultural relics found at sea, or even a tower of skulls hiding under the earth-these lost artefacts change what we thought we knew about certain beliefs.

programme.title: The Bermuda Triangle: Into Cursed Waters (S2) - EP 7
programme.desc: The team investigates a large wooden shipwreck that could be one of the Bermuda Triangle area's earliest victims: the long-lost SS D.H. Mount.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens (S15) - EP 232
programme.desc: Ancient Aliens is counting down the world's top ten pyramid sites, from a valley in Peru with over 250 hidden pyramids to an ancient Greek city with 4800-year-old ruins to Egypt's famous Giza Plateau.

programme.title: Secrets Declassified With David Duchovny (S1) - EP 1
programme.desc: What lies beneath? David Duchovny takes us into the top-secret government bases and the clandestine operations they were built to conceal. Discover a deadly poison lab, a nuclear missile site and more.

programme.title: The UnBelievable With Dan Aykroyd (S1) - EP 6
programme.desc: Picture this: a full-body gas mask for babies. How about Smell-o-Vision? Or a robot powered by eating slugs? These are all real inventions, and we've got them covered.

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner (S3) - EP 19
programme.desc: All over the world, there are places and objects that are thought to be cursed. Many people avoid these things, believing they will bring harm. Others think that curses are nothing but superstition.

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island (S10) - EP 22
programme.desc: After a new find suggests that the Oak Island mystery could have ancient ties to Italy, the team investigates a stone structure that has a design that matches the original Money Pit treasure shaft.

programme.title: Interrogation Raw (S1) - EP 12
programme.desc: Authorities question a woman who travelled with serial killer about whether she was a victim or an accomplice. Plus, a bone-chilling confession from a man who freely admits to killing a college student.

programme.title: Alone Australia S3 - EP 4
programme.desc: A shock medical complication threatens to remove one of the toughest participants while isolation begins to take its toll.

programme.title: Loving Gluten Free S1 - EP 4
programme.desc: Christina Glentis and Luke Lucas run Foddies in Camberwell, which caters to dietary requirements and low FODMAP patrons. Together they show Helen a recipe that incorporates gluten free pita bread.

programme.title: The Streets Hong Kong S1 - EP 2
programme.desc: Join Dan as he delves into the vibrant nightlife of Temple street in Kowloon. Queueing up for beloved Cantonese classics like claypot rice, he later unveils his own home-cook-friendly version.

programme.title: Landline (2025) - EP 24
programme.desc: Hosted by award-winning journalist Pip Courtney, Landline is Australia's only national agricultural television program covering stories from Australia's rural and regional heartland.

programme.title: Offsiders (2025) - EP 25
programme.desc: Abbey Gelmi and the panel cover the week in sport including the 2nd Test between the Wallabies and the British and Irish Lions, plus World Swimming Championships, AFL, NRL, Super Netball and Australia v West Indies in T20s.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show S5 - EP 23
programme.desc: Sam brings us the highlights from the 2025 Palau Pacific Mini Games, we visit the She Hoops basketball camp for young women, and PNG boxer John Ume joins us in the studio.

programme.title: News Breakfast (2025) - EP 149
programme.desc: As the day begins get the facts you need to stay informed. James Glenday and Bridget Brennan bring you the latest news, overnight developments and top stories, plus Catherine Murphy with sport and Emma Rebellato with weather.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings (2025) - EP 149
programme.desc: Stay in the know with what's happening this morning. ABC News brings you up-to-the-minute news to fuel your daily conversations so you can stay connected and follow the discussion across the day. Presented by Gemma Veness.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon (2025) - EP 149
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Kathryn Robinson brings you today's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter most.

programme.title: The Cook Up With Adam Liaw S5 - EP 75
programme.desc: It's Easy Entertaining, and you're invited to Adam's supper club with world renowned chef Asma Khan and Gourmet Traveller's head honcho, Joanna Hunkin.

programme.title: This Place (2019) - EP 16
programme.desc: Mugincoble is a sacred meeting place for the Wiradjuri nation but is now private property. Wiradjuri language teacher Lionel Lovett explains how various landmarks in town act as signposts towards the ancient gathering spot.

programme.title: Foreign Correspondent (2025) - EP 13
programme.desc: The former Soviet republic of Georgia is fighting for its very existence as a democracy. With dissenters being jailed and a raft of draconian laws passed, opposition figures claim neighbouring Russia is pulling the strings.

programme.title: First Weapons S1 - EP 2
programme.desc: Host Phil Breslin observes senior weapon makers as they craft the Amerr. Experts reveal the scientific principles, followed by a challenge of speed and skill highlighting how the weapon was once one of the fastest on earth.

programme.desc: Design has the power to bring people together, solve local challenges, and foster shared experiences. Discover how community influences design with stories from Mumbai, Central Java and Yogyakarta.

programme.title: Meet The Press 2025
programme.desc: Meet the Press is America's most-watched and No. 1 Sunday morning public affairs broadcast. Every Sunday morning for more than 70 years, millions of Americans have tuned in to get answers from U.S. and world leaders, and to hear analysis, discussion and review of the week's political events from noted journalists and experts.

programme.title: The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon 2025
programme.desc: The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon made its debut from Studio 6B in Rockefeller Center on Feb. 17, 2014. Emmy Award- and Grammy Award-winning comedian Jimmy Fallon brings a high-tempo energy to the storied NBC franchise with his welcoming interview style, love of audience participation, spot-on impersonations and innovative sketches.

programme.title: Europe Early Edition
programme.desc: Start your trading day with Europe Early Edition as major European financial centres take the reins of global markets. Get the first indication of how markets in Europe will react to an active Asian session and the handover from the US. programme.title: Squawk Box Europe
programme.desc: It’s one hour until the opening bell in Europe and Squawk Box Europe has everything you need to prepare for the first trade. programme.title: Us Squawk On The Street

It's Asia like you've never seen before - dripping in grandeur and extravagance, ready for anyone with deep enough pockets. Join host Anita Kapoor on a journey across the beautiful Asian continent, exploring the latest in luxury in Hong Kong, Sri Lanka, the Maldives, Singapore, Thailand, China, and Abu Dhabi.

programme.title: Teman Bicara
programme.desc: Indy Barends wants to share stories with his inspirational friends that can motivate people to be successful.

programme.title: Animalpedia
programme.desc: A program for animal lovers. Everything you need to know about each animal that will be featured in this program.

programme.title: Vet Tales
programme.desc: Follow the daily ups and downs of two enthusiastic and entertaining New Zealand veterinarians - Dr Mark Young and Dr Stacey Tremain. These long-time friends graduated vet school together 20 years ago. Mark is now a rural vet working with large animals and Stacey works in a busy animal hospital dealing with smaller patients.

programme.title: Dr Lisa To The Rescue S2
programme.desc: Emergency vet Dr. Lisa Chimes ventures out of the surgery room to raise awareness about animal welfare in this compassionate pet rescue series. Lisa's mission is to encourage potential pet owners to adopt rescue animals from shelters rather than support puppy mills or backyard breeders.

programme.title: Bonding Buddy
programme.desc: The unusual closeness between humans and their pets is unique in itself.

programme.title: Sea Today Business (Live)
programme.desc: SEA Today Business delivers up to-date news and live reports about global stock markets.

programme.title: The Land Of Spices
programme.desc: Indonesia is famous for its rich spices. This program provides an in-depth insight into each spice, its benefits for life and health. All information is conveyed in a modern yet humorous way.

programme.title: Exploring Nusantara With Kristian Hansen
programme.desc: Showcasing spectacular journey like you've never seen it before! Join with Kristian Hansen on non-stop journey one of Asia's most exotic and breath-taking nations Indonesia. Crossingmotorcycle journey from Sabang to Merauke to show you historic, cultural, people and insights alongside tantalising food and drinks, this show will inspire you and learn more about Indonesia.

programme.title: 2-Hour News Show (Live)
programme.desc: 2 Hour News Show is one of our flagship programs which airs daily 3 - 5 PM, this program have a CEO Talk segment where the guest star is the CEO of various reputable companies.

programme.title: The Travel Note
programme.desc: The Travel Note is a light travel program that discusses about tourist attractions, which includes history, culture, variety culinary there and also the comfortable and affordable hotel. Presented by a young, attractive and dynamic host._x000D_The Travel Note also provides some tips and tricks to the audiences.

programme.title: Tough Boats
programme.desc: A brand new series that explores some of the most fascinating and hard-core boat journeys on the planet. In this mini series we undertake epic journeys by boats in some of the toughest environments on earth. During our journeys we look at how the technology of boat travel has been adapted to survive, trade with and connect isolated communities.

programme.title: Side Walk
programme.desc: This program discusses the traditional food with its history, by bringing chefs from some restaurants / hotels that create innovations from the cuisine. Guided by a host who has experience and interest in the field of culinary specialities, Side Walk is an alternative entertainment program in the form of information on regional cuisine that has never been timeless.

programme.title: The Shelter
programme.desc: Documentary series about the lives of rescue animals in animal shelters. The sad and dark stories of animals that have to end up in shelters, the struggles of protectors of abandoned animals, the behavior of animals that are sometimes funny and sometimes chaotic, to the happy stories of those who finally have new homes and parents.

programme.title: Wild Cage
programme.desc: Indonesia's wildlife is incredibly diverse, with a variety of unique and spectacular wildlife living in Indonesia. Indonesia is home to many endemic species, and the existence of these endemic species is very important and part of our identity, as all creatures play an important role in maintaining the balance of Indonesia's wild ecosystems.

programme.title: The Animal Library
programme.desc: A program about animals. Not only about pets, but also discuss about the types of care, and also the costs incurred as well as the uniqueness.

programme.title: K9 Mounties
programme.desc: When the Royal Canadian Mountain Police Force are in search of a missing person they call in the help of an elite group. The K9 Mounties are rigorously trained to be able to locate those in need in the hardest to reach places.

programme.title: Apose Bos Baru
programme.desc: After the drama of losing his job, Andre tries to return to being Surya's assistant. But this time, he has to go through a probation period. Meanwhile, Dicky also loses his job due to a scandal. Now the vacant CEO position is filled by an unexpected figure, Ayu Ting Ting.

programme.title: Buddy Talk

programme.title: Finding Dish

programme.title: Satisfactory

The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: The Heat
programme.desc: The Heat is a daily talk show anchored from Washington, D.C. It focuses on top stories making news globally. The Heat presents tough issues from a comprehensive, balanced and international and Chinese perspective. Guests from on the spot and around the world ensure lively debate and a range of voices. Wherever the story is happening, The Heat is there.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: Sports Scene
programme.desc: Sports Scene brings you closer to all the action from all corners of the world, with highlights from across Europe, North America and China's top sports leagues. We examine the changes and growth in China's domestic leagues, as the country undergoes an incredible economic transformation.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: Global Business
programme.desc: The flagship business program of CGTN’s English language service. The program offers in-depth analysis of the latest economic data, business trends and market moving policies, zooming in on how all this affects ordinary people. With separate editions out of Asia, Europe, Africa and the Americas, Global Business features analysts and news-makers supported through a global network of correspondents. Global Business shows you what's moving markets in both developed and emerging economies.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: The Vibe
programme.desc: The Vibe is a 30-minute TV show that runs daily on weekdays on CGTN. The content focuses on exciting new trends, fashion, and cultural topics across a range of disciplines both in China and abroad. The host presents various culture-related topics in a fun way while also doing some in-depth analysis to give viewers a fuller picture as to what is happening, and why it matters.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: Africa Live
programme.desc: Africa Live is a news program that focuses on African issues and issues related to this diverse continent. CGTN’s Nairobi-based broadcast center produces Africa Live. Local correspondents and local production teams provide authoritative and in-depth stories from across the region. Africa Live is an objective and comprehensive look at every facet of African life.

programme.title: Asia Today
programme.desc: Asia Today highlights the latest news and social developments across Asia. Correspondents in over a dozen countries report on the region’s top stories as they happen. Analysts bring Asian perspective to topical and developing issues. Asia Today also emphasizes the diverse cultures and lifestyles of the world’s most populous continent.

programme.title: Dialogue
programme.desc: Dialogue is a prime time daily English talk show on CGTN. The 30-minute talk show covers a wide range of domestic and international topics, providing a balanced and critical perspective on current affairs and analysis within the framework of cross-cultural and multi-disciplinary comparisons. Inviting decision makers in government, business and academia onto the show, the host encourages guests to speak their minds frankly.

programme.title: China 24
programme.desc: China 24 is a prime time news program featuring in-depth reports and analysis of the stories in the headlines in China. Produced by CGTN’s studios in Beijing and Washington D.C., the show takes a compelling and comprehensive look at China. It explores the country’s business, politics, technology, culture, entertainment and more. China 24 tackles head-on the issues that matter most to the nation and its people, with topical reports highlighting challenges facing this fast-changing country.

programme.desc: The Hub with Wang Guan covers hot-button geopolitical and economic issues, as well as interesting stories and trends in culture, education, technology and lifestyle. programme.desc: Okitomo is fatally wounded by Sano Masakoto within the castle, and Masakoto subsequently takes his own life. Tsutaju begins to consider how he might still avenge Okitomo, even though Masakoto is already dead.

programme.title: Curtain Call - EP 12
programme.desc: Se Yeon makes a deal with a reporter to post an article on her marriage with Dong Je. Yoon Hee overhears Jae Heon confessing his feelings to Se Yeon.

programme.title: Curtain Call - EP 13
programme.desc: Moon Seung rejects Se Yeon's appeal to leave without meeting Geum Soon. Se Joon blames Jae Heon after Geum Soon fell unconscious on a trip with him.

programme.title: Curtain Call - EP 14
programme.desc: Se Gyu feels betrayed when Jae Heon and Yoon Hee confess their deception. Jae Heon plans to stage a play, 'Curtain Call' based on Geum Soon's story.

programme.title: Curtain Call - EP 15
programme.desc: Geum Soon tells Jae Heon she already knew he is not Moon Seong. Jae Heon makes efforts to let Moon Seong have a better understanding of Geum Soon.

programme.title: Taxi Driver - EP 16
programme.desc: Sung Cheol berates Chul Young for causing misery to his own family. Ha Na joins the Rainbow Taxi team in their operations to help victims of crime.

programme.title: Running Man - EP 740
programme.desc: The must watch for K-Variety shows! In this "urban action variety", the hosts complete a series of obstacles and aim to eliminate each other to win.

programme.desc: A family drama about Seon-ju who embarks on a mission to break away from her failing marriage and rebuild her life.

programme.title: Have a nice dream
programme.desc: There's a saying that "You can always get inspired by nature." Five outdoor enthusiasts-a cook, an athlete, a photographer, and two ecological experts-plan a two-day trip to enjoy the ultimate getaway in Taiwan. They share mysterious secret spots that have yet to be discovered, and places that are hard to access, featuring breathtaking mountain scenes and some of the bluest waters in the world. They also educate people on how to preserve Taiwan's beautiful and gifted environment.

programme.title: Let Me Take Your Pulse - EP 18
programme.desc: A doctoral student of Traditional Chinese Medicine starts his career at a governmental clinic. The director of the clinic is an ex-girlfriend who has different values. The two eventually work and grow together.

programme.title: Young Charioteers
programme.desc: At high school, YAU TAT (Him Law) and YIP FAI-TING (Sammy Sum) became good friends during a cycling race, but FAI-TING returned to Taiwan due to a family emergency. The two have lost contact with each other until one day they reunite at an accounting firm. TAT's supervisor LING HEI (Lin Xiawei) often manipulates office politics and sows discord amongst colleagues, making TAT and FAI-TING bear a grudge against each other.

programme.title: To Grow With Love
programme.desc: Filipino-born Chinese HO MEI-TIN (WU, MYOLIE) has been slightly overweight since childhood. She is constantly teased about her chubby frame while in Hong Kong, where it is widely recognized that thinness is the essence of beauty. Feeling so frustrated and annoyed, TIN decides to move back to the Philippines. However, when she notices the comments left in her drawing in response to her views on love, she soon has a change of heart and chooses to stay and look for the man of her dreams.

programme.title: Confidant, The
programme.desc: Owing to the destitution during their youth, LI LIAN-YING (Lai Yiu Cheung) and AN DE-HAI (Raymond Cho) have presented themselves as eunuchs in the court, where they serve their apprenticeship with an old eunuch LAU DOR-SANG (Chung King Fai). Having closely bonded to one another, the two respectively played dominant roles during the rule of Empress Dowager CIXI (Michelle Yim).

programme.title: Airport Strikers
programme.desc: Fresh-faced police officers Cheung King-san (Owen Cheung), San Hoi-ching (Sisley Choy), Ho Si-wa (Gloria Tang) and Wu Kwun-chung (Brian Chu) apply to join Airport Security Unit (ASU) due to different reasons. The quartet manage to survive drillmaster Man Wing-keung’s (Eddie Kwan) boot camp and become ASU officers after graduation. King-san and ASU CIP Cheung Chun-hak (Hugo Wong) just keep antagonizing each other.

programme.title: Life Begins At Forty
programme.desc: WING (FONG, ALEX), GAY (CHIN KA LOK) and FAI (TSEUNG CHI KWONG, RAM) are flatmates. They are facing their mid-life crises at the same time._x000D_ _x000D_WING used to be a renowned creative person in the advertising field. However his young boss, KI (SHEH CHARMAINE), now earns more credits than he does. KI is a perfectionist at work. She picks on WING constantly. However, when they are alone together, she is very fragile. She confuses WING completely.

programme.title: Life Begins At Forty

programme.title: Police Station No. 7
programme.desc: WONG YING KOO (SIT KA YIN, NANCY), a jovial optimistic middle-aged woman, is always ready to offer help to others in need. She lives happily with her daughter SUEN MAN WAH (WANG, IRENE) and other members of her family. She is a good friend of her neighbour WONG CHI CHEUNG (HUI SHIU HUNG), whose son WONG KIM (NG KAI WAH, LAWRENCE) respects her and regards her as his own mother. Corruption is a major social problem of the time in Hong Kong.

programme.title: The Stew of Life
programme.desc: Upon returning from a trip with her husband NG MAN TAK (Chung King Fai), cookery teacher LO SIU LAI (Lee Sze Kei, Louise) is shocked to find that her little daughter NG CHOI NI (Chen Fala) has started cohabiting with a homosexually inclined colleague LAU TAT YAN (Hung Tin Ming) while her divorced sister LO SIU MEI (Ng Wing Mei) is seemingly caught up in a love triangle between tenant YAU KAI (Mak Cheung Ching) and her ex-husband.

programme.title: Story Of Zom-B
programme.desc: Not only people have to come up with brainy ideas, but zombies also have to engage in "eating brains" literally! Chav Yu Yeung-kwong (Matthew Ho) loses his mind and rushes to the morgue as he shockingly notices something unusual about his body. He eats a bloody human brain in front of his buddies, forensic intern Koo Tak-ming (Arnold Kwok) and doashi Wah Lun (Milkson Fong)! Since then, Yeung-kwong possesses someone else’s memory and skills when he eats their brain.

programme.title: Fistful Of Stances, A
programme.desc: AU YEUNG WAI-LAN (Yuen Qiu), owner of a martial arts training school, is reunited with her long-lost son KOO YU-CHEUNG (Kevin Cheng) after years of agonizing separation. On his return home, CHEUNG is shocked to find that his younger brother KOO YU-TONG (Ma Kwok Ming) has been critically ill and that his father was murdered long ago by WING TAK (Lam Ka Wah), the existing director of a pharmaceutical company and a bitter old foe of the KOOs.

programme.title: Golden Faith
programme.desc: BEN (LAW KA LEUNG, GALLEN) meets NAM (HSUAN JESSICA HESTER) in Australia during a business trip. When he gets back to Hong Kong, he is involved in a robbery and NAM is in charge of prosecution._x000D__x000D_ BEN’s parents died in a ship accident when he was six. His brother was never found. BEN was saved by BON (CHUN PUI). BON treats him like his own son and passes his gold shop business to him.

programme.title: Golden Faith
